HowItWorks.title: Start learning in 3 simple steps
HowItWorks.subtitle: Download, pick your level, and dive into addictive mini-games. Zehnly AI adapts to your skill and keeps you progressing every day.
HowItWorks.step1Desc: Get Zehnly AI from App Store or Google Play. Create your free account in seconds and start your journey.
HowItWorks.step2Desc: Tell us if you're a beginner, intermediate, or advanced learner. Our AI adapts every game to your exact skill level.

Features.title: Play your way to fluency
Features.subtitle: Forget boring textbooks. Zehnly uses addictive mini-games to make learning English feel like play. Tap a game to preview it.

flashcards.title: Flashcards
flashcards.description: Master new vocabulary quickly with AI-powered flashcards tailored to your learning level.

oddOneOut.title: Odd One Out
oddOneOut.description: Spot the word that doesn't belong. Sharpen your logic and vocabulary skills instantly.

connections.title: Connections
connections.description: Find groups of four related items. Spot the patterns and make the connections!

fourPics.title: 4 Pics 1 Word
fourPics.description: Find the word that connects four images. Train your brain to think conceptually in English.

squares.title: Squares
squares.description: Discover hidden words by analyzing colorful letter tiles and patterns.

wordBattle.title: Word Battle
wordBattle.description: Face off against opponents in thrilling 1v1 battles of speed and vocabulary.

Speaking.progressDesc: See your speaking accuracy improve over time with detailed analytics.
